author: bartosik-hep
body:
Allows to separate between different tt+jets subprocesss with a single integer number: tt+bb, tt+cc, tt+2b, tt+2c, tt+light jet, etc.
An improved version of the custom producer provided in the [TWiki](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMSPublic/GenHFHadronMatcher#Event_categorization_example_1), based on the [GenHFHadronMatcher](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMSPublic/GenHFHadronMatcher) tool.
Supports all decay channels of the ttbar system.
To be used by Top and ttH analyses.
title: Introduced plugin for generator-level tt+X event categorisation
